content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to up-to-date information regarding Accordance's offerings. However, according to their website, Accordance offers a range of free video tutorials, webinars, and training resources for users looking to master specific features of the software. They also offer online training courses and in-person workshops that cover a range of topics, from beginner to advanced level. Customers can visit their website or contact their customer support for more information on specific offerings.
